Package com.gcu.controller

Class ClaimController

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.controller.ClaimController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/claims") public class ClaimController extends Object
Controller class for handling HTTP requests related to claims. This class defines methods to display, create, view, update, and delete claims.
Author:
Hugo Becerra

  • Method Details

    • display

      @GetMapping("") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView display()
      Displays the claims view.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView object for the claims view.

    • newClaim

      @GetMapping("/newClaim") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView newClaim()
      Displays the new claim form.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView object for the new claim form view.

    • createClaim

      @PostMapping("/create") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView createClaim(@Valid @ModelAttribute @Valid ClaimModel claimModel, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      Handles the creation of a new claim.
      Parameters:
      claimModel - The claim model to be created.
      bindingResult - BindingResult for validation.
      Returns:
      Redirects to the claims view on success, or stays on the new claim form on validation errors.

    • viewClaim

      @GetMapping("/view") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView viewClaim(@RequestParam(name="claimNumber",required=false) int claimId)
      Displays the details of a specific claim.
      Parameters:
      claimId - The ID of the claim to view.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView object for the claim details view.

    • updateClaim

      @PostMapping("/update") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateClaim(@ModelAttribute ClaimModel claimModel)
      Handles the update of a claim.
      Parameters:
      claimModel - The claim model to be updated.
      Returns:
      Redirects to the claims view.

    • deleteClaim

      @GetMapping("/delete") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView deleteClaim(@ModelAttribute ClaimModel claimModel)
      Handles the deletion of a claim.
      Parameters:
      claimModel - The claim model to delete.
      Returns:
      Redirects to the claims view.
